headline.main: U.S.-MIAJA 'PLOT' CHARGED IN SPAIN; Arriba Says General Got Offer to Lead Republican Army in a Move on Canary Islands WELLES BRANDS TALE LIE Serrano Suner Envisages Wide Economic Ruin if U.S. Enters the War

lead_paragraph: MADRID, July 31 (U.P.) -- Spanish Fascists accused the United States today of plotting to muster a Spanish Republican army under General Jose Miaja for possible use in the event that the United States attempted to occupy the Canary Islands.
abstract: Madrid Arriba repts U S plot to muster army under Gen J Miaja in move on Canary Islands

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: MADRID, July 31 (U.P.) -- Spanish Fascists accused the United States today of plotting to muster a Spanish Republican army under General Jose Miaja for possible use in the event that the United States attempted to occupy the Canary Islands....
